title: Local Business Feature Post
body: Write a community spotlight piece titled ‘Local Business Feature Post’ for [city] or [neighborhood]. Describe the community’s unique qualities, amenities, and lifestyle benefits. title: Condo Listing — Optimized Description
body: Write a listing description specifically for a [condo] in [city]. Highlight [key features], [neighborhood characteristics], and [lifestyle benefits] relevant to condo. Keep to 150–180 words and end with a clear CTA to schedule a viewing.

title: Single-Family Listing — Optimized Description
body: Write a listing description specifically for a [single-family] in [city]. Highlight [key features], [neighborhood characteristics], and [lifestyle benefits] relevant to single-family. Keep to 150–180 words and end with a clear CTA to schedule a viewing.

title: Townhome Listing — Optimized Description
body: Write a listing description specifically for a [townhome] in [city]. Highlight [key features], [neighborhood characteristics], and [lifestyle benefits] relevant to townhome. Keep to 150–180 words and end with a clear CTA to schedule a viewing.

title: Multifamily Listing — Optimized Description
body: Write a listing description specifically for a [multifamily] in [city]. Highlight [key features], [neighborhood characteristics], and [lifestyle benefits] relevant to multifamily. Keep to 150–180 words and end with a clear CTA to schedule a viewing.

title: Feature Spotlight — Waterfront
body: Create a listing module that spotlights waterfront for a [property type] in [city]. Include a 2‑sentence hero, a 3‑bullet feature list, and a micro‑CTA.

title: Feature Spotlight — Finishes
body: Create a listing module that spotlights finishes for a [property type] in [city]. Include a 2‑sentence hero, a 3‑bullet feature list, and a micro‑CTA.

title: Brand Awareness — Intro Reel Script
body: Create a 30‑s reel script that introduces [agent name] and positioning. Hook, credibility, market POV, and soft CTA to follow for weekly insights.

title: Commission Breakdown by Deal
body: Analyze this [closed deals CSV] and calculate: total commissions earned, average commission per deal, and breakdown by property type (condo, single-family, multifamily, etc.). Output a clear table with totals, averages, and 3 recommendations on which property types deliver the highest ROI in [city].

title: Expense Categorization & Tax Prep
body: Review this [expenses spreadsheet]. Categorize into deductible vs non-deductible based on [country/state] rules. Provide a summary with totals per category (marketing, travel, meals, software, home office) and highlight 3 optimization ideas to reduce taxable income for [year].

title: ROI of Ad Spend (Facebook vs Google)
body: Compare ROI of Facebook Ads vs Google Ads using this [ad spend data]. Calculate CPL and CPS for each. Identify the winning channel for [city] buyers and recommend a reallocation plan with suggested budgets and expected impact.

title: Agent Performance Dashboard
body: From this [team sales CSV], build a dashboard: revenue by agent, average deal size, conversion rates (leads → closings). Add 2 insights: who are top performers and which areas need coaching. End with a one-paragraph action plan.

title: Market Trend Forecast (6 Months)
body: Summarize housing market trends in [city] from MLS/Zillow data: price movement, days-on-market, demand shifts. Forecast the next 6 months and suggest 2 niches with growth potential, each with a messaging angle and sample CTA.

title: Pipeline & Conversion Analysis
body: From this [CRM leads CSV], calculate conversion rates for each stage: Lead → Qualified → Showing → Offer → Close. Identify bottlenecks and propose 3 concrete improvements (scripts, follow-ups, offers). Include a sample follow-up email.

title: Revenue Forecast (90 Days)
body: Using active listings and current pipeline, project expected revenue over the next 90 days. Provide best/base/worst-case scenarios with assumptions. Add a checklist to accelerate deal velocity in [city].

title: Neighborhood Profitability Heatmap
body: Compare closed deals across [list of neighborhoods]. Highlight which neighborhoods deliver highest average commission, fastest turnover, and best ROI. Output a ranked list with a short commentary per neighborhood.

title: Marketing Funnel Cost Analysis
body: Break down ad spend into funnel stages: Awareness → Consideration → Conversion. Compute average CPL and CPS per stage. Recommend how to cut underperforming stages and scale high-value touchpoints, with example budgets.

title: Tax-Ready Year-End Summary
body: Generate a year-end summary: total revenue, total expenses by category, net profit, and estimated taxes owed for [year]. Provide this in a tax-ready format (tables + bullet points) and list required documents for filing.

title: Lead Source ROI Tracker
body: From this [lead source CSV], calculate cost-per-lead and cost-per-sale for each source (Facebook, Google, referrals, open houses). Rank by ROI and recommend the top 2 channels to scale with expected outcomes.

title: Seasonality Insights for [city]
body: Using [historical sales data], identify which months or seasons generate the most closings in [city]. Recommend how to time open houses, listing launches, and ad spend for peak momentum.

title: Client Value (LTV) Segmentation
body: Analyze [past client list] to calculate lifetime value (LTV). Segment clients into High / Medium / Low value. Suggest 3 upsell or referral plays per segment with sample email subject lines.

title: A/B Test Results — Ad Copy
body: From this [ad performance CSV], compare A/B tested ad copy. Identify the winner by CTR and CPL. Suggest 2 improved variants for the next cycle for Instagram and Google Search.

title: Transaction Time Analysis
body: Analyze [deal history] to compute average time from listing to closing. Show which property types close fastest and which factors (price bands, features, neighborhoods) slow deals down. End with a speed-up checklist.

title: Profitability by Property Type
body: Compare profitability of condos, single-family, townhomes, and multifamily deals in [city]. Rank by average commission, turnover speed, and cost-to-acquire. Provide a recommendation matrix for focus areas.

title: Referral Network Revenue Impact
body: Calculate revenue from referrals in the past 12 months and compare to paid leads. Outline 3 strategies to expand the referral network, each with a sample outreach email.

title: Quarterly Tax Estimate & Plan
body: Based on revenue and expenses from Q1–Q4, estimate quarterly tax liability for [year]. Provide safe-harbor payment estimates and 3 legal tactics to reduce taxable income this year.

title: CRM Cleanup & Value Ranking
body: Review [CRM database]. Rank leads into Hot / Warm / Cold based on activity, budget, and timeline. Recommend 3 re-engagement actions for Warm leads and include a 3-email sequence.

title: Agent Compensation Model Scenarios
body: Analyze current agent commission splits vs brokerage revenue. Propose 2 compensation models (e.g., tiered commission, bonus for volume). Include pros/cons and a simple calculator description.

title: Revenue Forecast Analyzer
body: Act as a financial analyst for my real estate business. Using last year’s revenue (monthly breakdown), project revenue for the next 12 months. Include best-case, worst-case, and realistic scenarios. Present results in a clear table with month-by-month growth percentages.

title: Tax Deduction Finder
body: I am a realtor in the U.S. List all the possible tax deductions I can claim as a small business owner (home office, car expenses, software, etc.). Categorize deductions by type and include brief explanations.

title: Lead Conversion Tracker
body: You are my CRM assistant. I’ll paste my lead list with status (cold, warm, hot). Create a summary showing conversion rates at each stage. Suggest 3 tactics to increase conversions from warm → hot.

title: Competitor Benchmark Report
body: Act as my competitor analyst. Compare my real estate agency against 3 local competitors (I’ll provide their names/websites). Highlight strengths, weaknesses, opportunities, and risks in a SWOT table.

title: Property Portfolio Risk Check
body: I manage a portfolio of 10 properties. Identify risks such as over-reliance on a single neighborhood, market fluctuations, or property type imbalance. Suggest diversification strategies to reduce risk.

title: Ad Spend ROI Calculator
body: Here is my monthly ad spend (Facebook, Google, Zillow). Compare spend vs. leads generated. Calculate ROI for each channel and rank them from most effective to least effective. Suggest budget reallocation.

title: Client Lifetime Value Estimator
body: Act as a marketing strategist. Estimate the average lifetime value of my clients. I’ll provide average commission per sale, frequency of repeat clients, and referral rates. Present the calculation clearly and suggest ways to increase CLV.

title: Productivity Time Audit
body: I want to optimize my schedule. I’ll paste my weekly calendar. Categorize activities into: client-facing, admin, marketing, and personal. Suggest which tasks I should delegate or automate with AI to free up at least 5 hours per week.
